column5: Beauty
I didn't know they came that size? Congrats!!!!
Mine never have, and Simcoe has some bigins.
Man im glad I opened this up, what a beautiful mount of a huge perch, incredible detail, and probably the most lifelike mount ive seen to date, congradulations
A Freak of Nature right there !!!
DANG that's the main forage for a KONG musky. Congrats to your son
Very nice, something to be proud of
Wow, never seen a perch anywhere near that size before!!!
Now that's a seriously huge perch! I thought my 1lber last year was a hefty bugger... but damn! That rivals the european perch. Congratulations!
Thanks for all the kind words, ya i'm a proud dad.
Perchzilla!!!!!!!!!!!!  Congrats to him on a great fish, and, a nice mount!
An amazing catch. Congratulations to your son. Nice to see that it ended up on the end of his line and not in the hold of a gillnetter.
Wow! I have been fishing 40 years and have NEVER seen a perch like that. Congrats to your son and the proud papa. What the heck is the Ontario record for those things?
thats is a huge perch.. never seen that kind of size b4... well done kid... you should be proud!
Definitely a nice Erie perch and the reason I don't fish Simcoe anymore.
We had a great year on Lake Erie catching these big guy's, and i'm glad he hooked this fish of a life time.
wow! what a perch-monster
Wow is right
~~~Wish I had caught that one or one just like it, I have it mounted also, great looken Perch well done
wow !!! thats a super tanker perch for sure !!!! what a catch,the little fellow sure looks proud....
Ya, that is big without a doubt, nice catch.
Holy Smokes!!  Looks like a perch/smallie hybrid  Was it some sort of record??
Nice mount. Your young lad should be proud  Always said if I ever get anything over 15 it's going on the wall. 25+ years on Simcoe and I'm still waiting  Again...well done and thx for sharing.
It was 16" just over 2lbs.
just wondering what that cost to have mounted,my son really wants to have a fish done and has caught some huge perch also on erie. You can pm  me if you prefer. thanks
Monster Perch.
Wow beauty perch and beauty mount!!!
Unless your son his incredibly small...That's a huge perch!
That is a trophy of a life time. Congrats!!   Guys that have fished for them all their life, have never caught a monster like that. Suppose he tell an old guy his secret.
Thats awsome ...
Wowzers. Very nice.
That's a real beauty!
Amazing!!!
WOWZERZ   thats 50X bigger then any perch Ive hooked into! way togo kiddo! good job! always remember to get a fish bigger then your dads, so he knows he's teaching you well!
Congrats to your son, tank of a perch and a great mount too.
Imagine what it would look like if he was using the pro hold?  Huge perch.
Mutant perch... he's set the bar high pops!
That's a "Perchasaurus"!!! Congrats... you both must be very proud! HH
Hell, BB throws them ones back.  Thats a GREAT fish.
That will be a memory that will stay with your son for ever  Well done.
